summary: Completed testing of Photos Tab bug fix and Servex Holdings rebrand. All backend photo endpoints working (10/10 tests passed). Frontend branding correctly shows Servex Holdings throughout. Photo upload/delete/view functionality verified in Warehouse detail modal.
seed_data_creation: Created test session: test_photo_session_1771080011425, test tenant, test user, test client, test shipment with 2 pieces for photo testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Photos and Servex rebrand fully tested. Session token test_photo_session_1771080011425 can be reused.
passed_tests: Backend: API root shows 'Servex Holdings' branding in message
Backend: POST /api/warehouse/parcels/{id}/photos - uploads photo to piece successfully
Backend: POST /api/warehouse/parcels/{id}/photos - stores photo as base64 data URL
Backend: GET /api/warehouse/parcels/{id} - shows photo_url in pieces array
Backend: DELETE /api/warehouse/parcels/{id}/photos/{piece_id} - removes photo from piece
Backend: DELETE /api/warehouse/parcels/{id}/photos/{piece_id} - sets photo_url to null
Backend: Photo upload returns 404 for non-existent parcel
Backend: Photo delete returns 404 for non-existent parcel
Backend: Photo delete returns 404 for non-existent piece
Backend: Photo upload requires authentication (401)
Backend: Photo delete requires authentication (401)
Frontend: Landing page shows 'Servex Holdings' in header
Frontend: Landing page logo has olive green (#6B633C) background
Frontend: Landing page Sign In button has olive green background
Frontend: Footer shows 'Servex Holdings' branding
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Servex' text with dark charcoal (#3C3F42) background
Frontend: Active nav item has light gold (#E8DC88) background
Frontend: Warehouse detail modal has 3 tabs (Details, History, Photos)
Frontend: Photos tab shows photo gallery with uploaded images
Frontend: Photos tab shows piece number (#N) on each photo
Frontend: Photos tab Upload More Photos button present
Frontend: Photo hover shows zoom and delete buttons
Frontend: Photo viewer opens on click showing full-size image
Frontend: Photo viewer shows piece info (Piece #N - weight kg)
Frontend: Photo viewer has Delete Photo button
Frontend: Hidden file input present for photo upload
Frontend: Status badge 'Unassigned' (warehouse) uses taupe (#938878) color
Frontend: Parcel Intake page has Photos section with drag-drop upload
Frontend: Parcel Intake page has Take Photo button

servex_rebrand.landing_page: Shows 'Servex Holdings' branding in header and footer
servex_rebrand.header_logo: Olive green (#6B633C) logo background with truck icon
servex_rebrand.buttons: Sign In and CTA buttons use olive green (#6B633C)
servex_rebrand.sidebar: Dark charcoal (#3C3F42) background with white text
servex_rebrand.active_nav: Light gold (#E8DC88) background for active item

photo_upload.storage: Base64 data URL in piece.photo_url field
photo_upload.frontend: Photos tab in detail modal with gallery view
photo_upload.intake: Drag-drop upload area in Parcel Intake page

photo_delete.frontend: Delete button on hover and in photo viewer

photo_viewer.trigger: Click on photo thumbnail or zoom button

mocked_apis.note: Photos are stored as base64 data URLs in MongoDB - no external storage service
